steps.goal: Find relevant news articles about Samsung Electronics' stock price fluctuations over the last two weeks.
Find relevant analyst reports about Samsung Electronics' stock price fluctuations over the last two weeks.
Summarize the key findings from the news articles.
Summarize the key findings from the analyst reports.
Combine the summaries from the news articles and analyst reports into a single, concise summary of Samsung Electronics' stock price fluctuations over the last two weeks.
Post the summary to the "agentic" Slack channel.

Lead SNS/social-signal collection and meaning-level summarization for this request.
User request: 최근 2주간의 삼성전사 주식 가격 변동에 대해 뉴스랑 증권사 리포트 찾아서 분석하고 내용 정리해서 슬랙 agentic 채널에 올려줘
